definition: befitting or characteristic of those who incline to social exclusiveness and who rebuff the advances of people considered inferior
details:
adjective
- befitting or characteristic of those who incline to social exclusiveness and who rebuff the advances of people considered inferior
= synonyms: cliquish, clubby, snobbish, snobby
- characteristic of a clan especially in being unified
= example: characteristic of a clan especially in being unified
